content.raw: It'd be nice if it could, but, yeah, it needs to be in there. Meanwhile, that version is pretty much meaningless for a pure CMake source. It'd be nice if there could be an _even more_ minimal package.xml for external projects (nothing more than "this is a cmake package"). Let me get the thoughts of the buildsystem sig on this.
